description:
For many years, Dr. Ootsubo the dentist has worried over the fact that he isn`t much liked by children. After much trial and error in trying to find a way to get kids to like him, he builds a robot that looks just like Tama. Mechanical Tama becomes his assistant and the children love him! When Tama and the others meet Mechanical Tama in the park, the data inputted into Mechanical Tama causes him to suddenly start exposing everyone`s deepest thoughts, making everyone very angry. After a run in with Bull, Mechanical Tama goes on a rampage, throwing Third Street into chaos!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Wanpaku E no Gu Sensou / Fue no Sasayaki
わんぱく絵の具戦争 / 笛のささやき
